ISSUE.TITLE: Flowable 6.6 UI - Missing "<omgdi:waypoint" when using receiveEventTask
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: **Describe the bug** When I export .bpmn the file is missing one part of the waypoints that describes the line between tasks only in case od receive event task. When I switch the same task for other one like sendEventTask that doesn't heppen. **Expected behavior** The generated .bpmn code should have all needed waypoints. Generated with flowable modeler. **Code** Wrong code * currently exists": ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/16398511/97430414-258ff400-1919-11eb-8f9b-c05dd1aeb591.png) Expected code: ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/16398511/97430483-3ccee180-1919-11eb-882d-3f0e8439fca4.png) **Additional context** Flowable 6.6. Only heppens with new type of task - receive event task.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix issue with losing escalation references on export / import #2748

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix issue with receive and send event task DI information #2668
Fix issue with receive and send event task DI information #2668
